context.p: BundleMaker provides a bunch of views, editor and actions that allows you to parse, analyze and transform a given Java based system. To make work with BundleMaker as comfortable as possible, BundleMaker also defines a custom perspective.

info.p: You can open the BundleMaker perspective by opening the Open Perspective dialog (Window -> Open Perspective -> Other...). In the Open Perspective dialog, you can select the BundleMaker perspective. Click OK.

result.p: The BundleMaker perspective defines the initial set and layout of releted views in the Workbench window.
